verse: अपहरति मनो मे कोऽप्ययं कृष्णचौरः प्रणतदुरितचौरः पूतनाप्राणचौरः । वलयवसनचौरो बालगोपांगनानाम् नयनहृदयचौरः पश्यतां सज्जनानाम् ॥
overall_meaning: Who indeed steals my mind? Krishna, the thief of sins bowed, the life thief of Pootana, the bracelet-wearing thief of the courtyard's child protector, the heart thief of eyes, for those who see, of the righteous.
